text: Money Bin is a fictional building that Scrooge McDuck owns. The building was constructed in 1902, after Scrooge entered the diamond market. The building contains all of Scrooge's fortune, which is 'quadrillions' of dollars. The old duck also owns factories, mines, railroads, oil wells and spaceships. The building is full of gold coins, where Scrooge likes to swim in. The building appears on DuckTales, The Life and times of Scrooge McDuck, and DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp. Category:Fictional buildings and structures Category:DuckTales en:Duck universe#Money Bin
title: Money Bin
